lemma C_eq_All_untilSorted: "DenyAll\<in>set(policy2list p) \<Longrightarrow> all_in_list(policy2list p) l \<Longrightarrow> allNetsDistinct(policy2list p) \<Longrightarrow> Cp(list2FWpolicy (sort (removeShadowRules2 (remdups (rm_MT_rules Cp (insertDeny (removeShadowRules1 (policy2list p)))))) l)) = Cp p"
